object.name: resumeMessage1
object.translatableAttribute:
# = Team number Player = Name of the player Rtng = Player rating Civ = Civilization rT = Researched techs
POP = PopCount/PopLimit SUP = Total support units such as healers, traders, women ARMY = Total military units Inf = Infantry units Cav = Cavalry units Cha = Champion units Sie = Siege units + war elephants
Kil = Units you killed Dth = Units you lost K/D = Kill/ Death Ratio
○/● = Full circle when cartography has been researched or when you are without mutual allies.

object.name: resumeMessage2
object.translatableAttribute:
Total Score = Economy + Military + Exploration
Economy Score = (Resources gathered + Trade income) / 10
Military Score = (Enemy units killed value + Units captured value + Enemy buildings destroyed value + Buildings captured value) / 10
Exploration Score = Percent map explored * 10
Advice: The speed of scrolling, rotating and zooming can be adjusted via hotkeys.
